parameters.query:
WITH ready AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt
  FROM newsletter_subscribers ns
  WHERE ns.status = 'subscribed'
    AND ns.unsubscribed_at IS NULL
    AND ns.confirmed_at IS NOT NULL
    AND (ns.last_sent_at IS NULL OR ns.last_sent_at <= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 days')
)
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT cnt FROM ready), 0)::int AS ready_count;

SELECT
  ns.id AS subscriber_id,
  ns.contact_id,
  ns.unsubscribe_token,
  ns.last_sent_at,
  ns.confirmed_at,
  c.email,
  c.full_name,
  COALESCE(NULLIF(c.preferred_lang, ''), 'ru') AS preferred_lang
FROM newsletter_subscribers ns
JOIN contacts c ON c.id = ns.contact_id
WHERE ns.status = 'subscribed'
  AND ns.unsubscribed_at IS NULL
  AND ns.confirmed_at IS NOT NULL
  AND (ns.last_sent_at IS NULL OR ns.last_sent_at <= NOW() - INTERVAL '5 days');

UPDATE newsletter_subscribers
SET last_sent_at = NOW(), updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $1::uuid
RETURNING id;
